item.description:
Hey Boston Volunteers, 

We have our first fundraiser coming up - Chef Priya's Popular Indian Cooking class.

Learn more: http://www.meetup.com/BigEnoughtoDeliver/events/98470212/


We'll need your help with it - we're expecting more than forty people.

Can you help Priya with:
-Set up
-Helping with stirring and measuring

-Passing out samples to students

-Clean up

 

This will be a very hands-on event and you'll be front and center.


It's an easy way for you to spend a little time and help your nonprofit. We need 3-4 volunteers. Can you help?

 

Thank you in advance, :)
Priya and Josh

P.S. Learn more about Chef Priya's Popular Indian Cooking Fundraiser:

http://www.meetup.com/BigEnoughtoDeliver/events/98470212/

 

P.P.S. There will be a Bonus special Indian FREE gift for you!

The Boston Volunteers
Big Enough to deliver, small enough to care
Learn more: www.BostonVolunteer.org
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the popular group standing next to the door. I'll provide my cell # for your convenience.

group.name: Boston Volunteers. Big enough 2 deliver, small enough 2 care

item.name: Help with our fundraiser. Hands on experience + Bonus Special FREE gift for you!
